sourcesContent:
import logo from "./logo.svg"; import "./App.css"; import {useState} from "react"; import { Title } from "./components/title/Title"; import { OutputScreen } from "./components/outputScreen/OutputScreen"; function App() { const [currentButton, setCurrentButton] = useState(0) return (
<div className="bg-primary h-auto w-1/5 border rounded-xl px-8 py-20"> <OutputScreen /> <div className="flex justify-between items-center pt-4"> <button className="bg-secondary py-2 px-4 border-0 rounded-md text-white text-lg" onClick={()=>setCurrentButton(0)}> AC </button> <button className="bg-secondary py-2 px-4 border-0rounded-md text-white text-lg"> +/- </button> <button className="bg-secondary py-2 px-4 border-0 rounded-md text-white text-lg"> % </button> <button className="bg-secondary py-2 px-4 border-0 rounded-md text-white text-lg"> / </button> </div> <div className="flex justify-between items-center pt-2"> <button className="text-white text-2xl" onClick={()=>setCurrentButton(7)}>7</button> <button className="text-white text-2xl" onClick={()=>setCurrentButton(8)}>8</button> <button className="text-white text-2xl" onClick={()=>setCurrentButton(9)}>9</button> <button className="bg-secondary py-2 px-4 border-0 rounded-md text-white text-2xl"> * </button> </div> <div className="flex justify-between items-center pt-2"> <button className="text-white text-2xl" onClick={()=>setCurrentButton(4)}>4</button> <button className="text-white text-2xl" onClick={()=>setCurrentButton(5)}>5</button> <button className="text-white text-2xl" onClick={()=>setCurrentButton(6)}>6</button> <button className="bg-secondary py-2 px-4 border-0 rounded-md text-white text-2xl"> + </button> </div> <div className="flex justify-between items-center pt-2"> <button className="text-white text-2xl" onClick={()=>setCurrentButton(1)}>1</button> <button className="text-white text-2xl" onClick={()=>setCurrentButton(2)}>2</button> <button className="text-white text-2xl" onClick={()=>setCurrentButton(3)}>3</button> <button className="bg-secondary py-2 px-4 border-0 rounded-md text-white text-2xl"> - </button> </div> <div className="flex justify-between items-center pt-2"> <button className="text-white text-2xl" onClick={()=>setCurrentButton(0)}>0</button> <button className="text-white text-2xl" onClick={()=>setCurrentButton(".")}>.</button> <button className="bg-tertiary py-2 px-12 border-0 rounded-md text-white text-2xl"> = </button> </div> </div> </div> </div> ); } export default App;
